entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK installs leave versioned directories at the root of %localappdata% on windows #29863
  • "dotnet watch" fails to start in Ubuntu 22.04 with .NET-SDK #29846
  • Preview features mechanism needs rework #29844
    Backlog

Closed

  • dotnet publish -p:PublishProfile=ClickOnceProfile error #28403
  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools failed - 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten' version '6.0.12' is lower than version '6.0.13' #29852
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.10) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29082

PullRequests

Created

  • Mention that preview SDKs in VS needs to be turned on in the dev guide #29870
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add *.swp to gitignore template #29866
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #29862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • enforce codestyle on build by default #29860
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #29858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #29855
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29853
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29843
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29836
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #29857
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #29856
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29372
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the version of the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Worspaces used in the GenAPI #29847
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29837
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29838
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29835
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages & Change Culture For All Based on OS Main Language #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Include dotnet-watch redist output in layouts #29611
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix bad merge that incorrectly didn't exclude some packages #29435
    Area-NetSDK
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.1xx #29463
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.2xx #29464
    Area-Infrastructure
